definition: Jianwen Emperor, reign name of second Ming Emperor Zhu Yunwen 朱允炆[Zhu1 Yun3 wen2] (1377-1402), reigned 1398-1402

surname Wen
reign name of second Ming emperor, reigned 1398-1402, deposed in 1402

sentences.english: The governor-inspector system of Ming originates in the Jian-wen imperial and is basically established in the "Xuan-de period".
sentences.chinese: 明代巡撫制度萌芽於建文時，基本確立於宣德時期。

sentences.english: Tell the guards in the palace of Prince jianwen.
sentences.chinese: 守衛告訴建文太子在宮裏。
